data.lyric:
[ti:The Greatest]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:Pray 4 Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Greatest - Rod Wave
[00:00.15]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Aaron Tago/Kyre Trask
[00:00.30]Ayy ayy ayy ayy ayy that's probably Tago
[00:03.02]Had to run that b***h back
[00:05.13]I swear once they see where a n***a come from
[00:07.97]All of this s**t that you had to go through bruh
[00:10.73]They don't understand
[00:11.16]I bet my last track probably gave you lockjaw hey Lilkdubb
[00:15.61]Young n***a from the bottom of the map
[00:17.19]Came up riding with the strap iron on his lap
[00:19.57]One false move get whacked
[00:20.95]Got the whole hood on his back
[00:22.22]And it's just like that
[00:23.38]For my n***as trapped in the trap
[00:24.83]Pray to God we all make it back pray we all make it back
[00:27.07]Gotta pray we all make it back
[00:28.49]And I know it's raw that I rap
[00:29.82]But a street n***a first
[00:31.15]Tell the crackers free Mac Deezy
[00:32.49]Ma look at your son I'm on TV
[00:33.89]They didn't believe me
[00:34.85]N***a went and got it off the greezy
[00:36.32]It's hard but I make it look easy a crazy achievement
[00:38.64]Won't really f**k with no rappers
[00:40.07]All these n***as hustling backwards
[00:41.37]Misguiding the youth
[00:42.51]But long as I know the truth
[00:43.83]That's another subject for after
[00:45.13]And I'm riding in the Rover
[00:46.27]12 keep on trying to pull me over
[00:47.67]Asking a n***a if I stole it I bought it I own it
[00:49.98]I remember walking to school
[00:51.49]Catching the bus early morning like Ma I ain't going
[00:53.78]I was in the hallways roaming
[00:55.17]But I still got my diploma I got my diploma
[00:57.55]Went to school all twelve years just to get a job selling donuts
[01:00.50]Man that's crazy
[01:01.38]I ain't with the minimum waging
[01:02.89]I ain't with the modern day slavery
[01:04.24]The f**k is you saying
[01:05.33]Told the crackers "F**k you pay me"
[01:06.85]Had to tell 'em "F**k you pay me"
[01:08.03]It's back to the block
[01:09.06]Well I guess it's back to the block
[01:10.26]In the streets running 'round playing hooky
[01:11.68]Hooky
[01:12.79]And I ain't never sold no crack but I'm so street I can cook it
[01:15.60]And I know it's hard to find a way
[01:19.48]But you're bound to see brighter days
[01:24.03]A million dollars can't change me n***a
[01:25.57]'Cause hard times made me n***a
[01:27.19]A hard grind saved me n***a
[01:28.64]I got it off the pavement n***a
[01:29.93]I got it off the pavement my n***a
[01:31.74]Young n***a from the bottom of the map
[01:33.36]Came up riding with the strap
[01:34.69]Yeah yeah
[01:35.72]Young n***a got the hood on his back
[01:37.19]He got the whole hood on his back yeah
[01:39.30]Didn't think you'd be who you are my n***a
[01:43.20]Didn't think you'd take it this far my n***a
[01:46.82]Okay
[01:47.02]You like the greatest you like the greatest to me
[01:50.67]You like the greatest you like the greatest to me
[01:54.51]Give a f**k what they saying you like the greatest to me yeah
[02:02.23]You like the greatest you like the greatest to me
[02:06.05]You like the greatest you like the greatest to me
[02:09.98]Yeah yeah yeah
[02:13.89]F**k what they saying you like the greatest to me yeah
[02:20.76]'Cause a n***a built off this s**t bruh this s**t in me bruh for real
[02:26.78]Ayy free C5 man grrah
[02:29.79]We ain't forget about you my n***a
[02:34.26]Grindin' baby
data.trans:
[ti:The Greatest]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:Pray 4 Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.15]//
[00:00.30]Yung Tago制作
[00:03.02]必须再来一次
[00:05.13]我发誓 一旦他们知道我来自何方
[00:07.97]我经历了多少艰难困苦
[00:10.73]他们都不会理解
[00:11.16]Lilkdubb制作
[00:15.61]年轻小伙从前寂寂无名
[00:17.19]一直以来都带着武器 枪就别在他的腿上
[00:19.57]稍有不慎 你就完蛋了
[00:20.95]整个地盘都由他罩着
[00:22.22]就是这种情况
[00:23.38]我那些还在做街头生意的兄弟
[00:24.83]向天祈祷 希望我们都能活着回来
[00:27.07]必须祈祷我们能够活着回来
[00:28.49]我知道我的说唱很不错
[00:29.82]但我首先是个街头小子
[00:31.15]告诉那些人 放了Mac Deezy
[00:32.49]妈妈 看看你的儿子 我上电视啦
[00:33.89]他们不相信我
[00:34.85]我现在已经不是一般人了
[00:36.32]这不容易 但我让它看起来简单 多么了不起的成就
[00:38.64]不会和任何说唱歌手往来
[00:40.07]这些家伙都越来越糟心
[00:41.37]误导年轻人
[00:42.51]但我知道真相如何
[00:43.83]那是另一个话题 以后再谈
[00:45.13]我现在开着路虎揽胜
[00:46.27]警察总想把我拦下来
[00:47.67]问我这车是不是偷来的 我买的 我就是车主
[00:49.98]我记得以前只能走路去上学
[00:51.49]最好的状况就是早上去挤公交车 我当时特别不情愿
[00:53.78]我在大厅里面徘徊
[00:55.17]但我还是得到了文凭 我是有文凭的人
[00:57.55]上了十二年的学 就找了个卖甜甜圈的工作
[01:00.50]朋友 这你敢信
[01:01.38]我不满足于最低薪水
[01:02.89]我不接受现代版的奴役制
[01:04.24]你在说什么玩意儿
[01:05.33]告诉那些家伙 去你的 给我付钱
[01:06.85]必须告诉他们 去你的 给我付钱
[01:08.03]回到街头
[01:09.06]我想 还是回到街头干吧
[01:10.26]在街头打拼 懒得干那破工作
[01:11.68]旷工
[01:12.79]我没有卖过那种东西 但我很有街头范 我可以生产那种东西
[01:15.60]我知道寻找出路很难
[01:19.48]但你注定会有更光明的未来
[01:24.03]一百万美元改变不了我 兄弟
[01:25.57]因为艰难时光成就了今天的我 兄弟
[01:27.19]努力拼搏拯救了我 兄弟
[01:28.64]我终于混出了头 兄弟
[01:29.93]我终于混出了头 我的兄弟
[01:31.74]年轻小伙从前寂寂无名
[01:33.36]一直以来都带着武器
[01:34.69]//
[01:35.72]年轻人背负着整个地盘
[01:37.19]整个地盘都由他罩着
[01:39.30]没有想到你会有今天这样的成就 兄弟
[01:43.20]没想到你会取得这样大的成就 兄弟
[01:46.82]好的
[01:47.02]我觉得你就是最了不起的人
[01:50.67]我觉得你就是最了不起的人
[01:54.51]不在乎他们说什么 我觉得你就是最了不起的人
[02:02.23]我觉得你就是最了不起的人
[02:06.05]我觉得你就是最了不起的人
[02:09.98]//
[02:13.89]不在乎他们说什么 我觉得你就是最了不起的人
[02:20.76]因为我是靠着这些东西长大的 兄弟 这已经与我不可分离 真的
[02:26.78]放了C5 朋友
[02:29.79]我们没有忘记你
[02:34.26]奋力拼搏 宝贝
